author: cnbc.com
title: North Dallas Bank & Trust Co. Announces First Quarter Earnings of $1.09 per Share
text:
DALLAS, April 11, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- North Dallas Bank & Trust Co. (OTCBB:NODB) announces net earnings of $2,799,318 or $1.09 per share for the three months ending March 31, 2018, compared to $1,879,796 or $0.73 per share for the same period in 2017.
North Dallas Bank & Trust Co. is an independent bank established in 1961 with five locations in the Dallas area. Current earnings were prepared internally without review by the companyâ€™s independent accountants. Earnings are the result of past performance, events and market conditions and are not a guarantee of future results. Any forward-looking implications derived from this information may differ materially from actual results. Please direct any questions to Glenn Henry, SVP and CFO.
Assets $1.4B
